short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block distracting sites by putting your impatience to work for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dopanope makes you wait before you can access your favorite time-wasting websites, decoupling the action from the neurological reward. Put your impatience to work for you and stop mindlessly browsing the internet.
